items.title: Chipotle downplays looming Trump tariffs, says only half of its avocados are from Mexico

items.title: Remains of all 67 people killed in D.C. aircraft collision recovered, officials say
items.content: The bodies of all 67 people killed in the collision of an American Airlines regional jet with an Army helicopter have been recovered, officials said Tuesday.
items.contentSnippet: The bodies of all 67 people killed in the collision of an American Airlines regional jet with an Army helicopter have been recovered, officials said Tuesday.

items.title: GM cuts 50% of Cruise staff after ending robotaxi business
items.content: General Motors is laying off roughly half its employees who remain at its discontinued Cruise robotaxi business.
items.contentSnippet: General Motors is laying off roughly half its employees who remain at its discontinued Cruise robotaxi business.

items.title: Walmart's latest acquisition is a shopping mall in Pennsylvania
items.content: Walmart's purchase was an all-cash $34 million deal, according to CBL, a shopping mall owner that sold the property.
items.contentSnippet: Walmart's purchase was an all-cash $34 million deal, according to CBL, a shopping mall owner that sold the property.

items.title: Boeing's Starliner losses top $2 billion after spacecraft program reports worst year yet

items.title: Fox reveals plans to launch subscription streaming service this year
items.content: Fox has so far been on the sidelines of streaming, with the exception of its free, ad-supported service Tubi.

items.title: McDonald's Shamrock Shake returns — and so does Grimace's uncle

items.title: Pfizer tops earnings estimates as Covid product sales beat expectations and cost cuts pay off
items.content: The results cap off a critical year for Pfizer, which has been slashing costs as it recovers from the rapid decline of its Covid business and stock price.

items.title: Merck shares plunge as company pauses Gardasil vaccine shipments in China, hurting 2025 outlook

items.title: PepsiCo earnings beat estimates, but demand for drinks and snacks drops in North America

items.title: The Super Bowl will stream for free on Tubi, a big move for Fox's streaming strategy

items.title: Honda's new EV production revolution begins with $1 billion investment in Ohio

items.title: FAA to restrict helicopter traffic around D.C. airport after fatal airplane collision
